main event: On July 13th, 1955, in Long Beach and Glennavon, California, a round red and white object the size of a quarter at arm's length was observed to have ascended, then descended, and traveled west.
interesting points: The duration of the observation was seven minutes.
One UFO was observed, and the conclusion suggested it could possibly be a balloon or an aircraft.
The object appeared to be faster than a jet and made a rapid descent before heading west.
The sighting was visually confirmed from the ground.
The lack of details prevented any definitive conclusions about the nature of the object.
sighted object: One round red and white object
